post.body: no worries! Thank the programmers from me for all their hard work!
I know. I love handmade presents. Love and time go into them and thats better than any shop purchased mass produced gift.
I've got no money, so shopping isn't going to happen. I think I'm going to have to make everyone something
I was going through some of the catagories today and the basket one says it has 13 items but it has way less.
good luck with the exam!
I would buy but the shipping is more than the item, not your fault I know :(
good point, thanks for replying
thank you. I don't have enough of the yarn left for a scarf so it will have to be cowl or handwarmers,
They are very foolish and never see beyond their own noses.There is none so deaf as will not hear!
until that day they will keep moving yours andanyones thread that links to a blog into a forum where it will sink and get lost
The only way you will make Etsy happy over this issue is if you write booklets on the topic and sell them in your shop.
could well be, although I feel I need to finish the arm warmers I'm making before going to bed and there is an hours work left
bailing you out? when?
ewwww
Oh My, someone is a little upset.
I want snow.... send me some in the post.

it's a blessing and a curse!
Happy Christmas!
I just re did that and it appears to have worked now but this morning when I did that it didn't fix it. Have they fixed something?
I tried that and it didn't work.
Whats going on with the login & logout problem? I can't seem to log out. I reported it but haven't heard anything yet.
mail me some snow :)
